item.title: The Suze Orman Rule You Should Probably Break
item.description: Here's what to know about the personal finance guru's suggestion to cut up your credit cards.

item.title: Costco Slapped With Lawsuit Over Beloved Item
item.description: If the plaintiffs win class-action certification, the class could potentially include anyone who ever bought this Costco prepared food item.

item.title: The Benefits of ‘Nepo Baby’ Credit Scores Don’t Last Forever, Study Finds
item.description: People who were authorized users on credit cards are more likely to get approved for loans, but struggle with paying them back.

item.title: Costco Releases Nike Collab — Here’s Where to Buy Them
item.description: Each pair of Kirkland Signature x Nike SB Dunk Low retails for $134.99.

item.title: Your 401(k) Isn’t an Investment Plan. Here’s What Is
item.description: These accounts offer tax-deferred growth and a high contribution limit, but they also require an investment strategy.
